Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.thinModelComponents

Class ThinTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.thinModelComponents.ThinTrack
public class ThinTrack
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the thin track. in particular, it is used from the client to represent the track with only the position and the pope favour tiles

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ThinTrack​(Player player)
    this constructor create the track starting from a player, getting from him all the attributes needed
